c1.name: Ice Unleashed
c1.descriptionRaw: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.
c1.description: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

c2.name: Atmospheric Revolution
c2.descriptionRaw: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their CD time decreased by 15%.
c2.description: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

c3.name: Cloudburst
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Frozen Skies
c4.descriptionRaw:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.
c4.description:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

c5.name: The True Path
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rally of Four Blades
c6.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star</color> deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.
c6.description:
Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.
